H0.text: Friction is the property of volume and mass.

H1.text: Light is a property of volume and mass.

H2.text: Matter is the entity that has both volume and mass.

H3.text: Sound is a property of volume and mass.

A4.text: Matter generally includes atoms and anything made up of them, and any particles that act as if they have both rest mass and volume.

A5.text: It does not include massless particles such as photons, or other energy phenomena or waves such as light or heat.
